alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 5:11PM MST until August 17 at 5:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MST FOR PINAL COUNTY... At 510 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arizola, or near Casa Grande, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola, Toltec, and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 204. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 158 and 178. AZ Route 347 near mile marker 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
